attributes.action: Allow us to have text for the English literature exam.
attributes.additional_details: No evidence has been submitted yet as it is the first year to try out this new scheme. However, in mock exams, I believe it is very stressful for students.
attributes.background: Seeing as it's 2017, the new english literature paper requires us to remember key quotes from all key characters and selective themes off by heart. I believe this is too much information to memorise considering how many key characters and themes there are for each play/novel.
